ComicInfo.Series: Grimm Fairy Tales Presents Godstorm: Hercules Payne
ComicInfo.Summary:
Now armed with the power of the gods, Andre Payne sets out on a mission of redemption. But will his quest to do good in a city that wants him dead help redeem him, or get him in a deeper mess? Gangsters and gods collide in this climatic issue of Hercules!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Paolo Pantalena & Ross Campbell | 1 | B | Cover B | Eric J & Stephen Schaffer | 2 | C | Cover C | Alfredo Reyes & Wes Hartman | 3 | D | Cover D | AC Osorio & David Ocampo | 4 |
